attributes.action: Red Letter Day To All Politicians and All Party Leaders
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Prime Minister, Deputy Prime Minister and Rt Hon Ed Miliband,

We the People approximately 60 million in the United Kingdom want all leaders and politicians to collectively serve the immediate interests of our folk and not petty party politics, our Nation faces Social and Economic Collapse.

The basic matters to address are as follows:-

1/. Immediately Sort Out A New Banking System Once and For All.
2/. Get Direct Funding To Small Business The Job Creators For Our Folk
3/. Crack Down On Tax Evasion and Avoidance Set Up License For All Accountants To Register.
4/. Housing Program That All Parties Have Neglected
5/. Social Housing Program To Care For The Elderly.

The people of this Great Nation requires collective action in the interests of the State.

Respectfully Yours,

Citizens of Britain

rejection.details: I'm afraid you'll need seperate petitions for all of these issues.
